project.property: Convert binary files to bitmaps for visual inspection

Provides a Python script to convert arbitrary files to bitmap images by encoding the binary data in the pixel values. This can be used for visual inspection of small and medium-sized (up to a few megabytes) files. . Additionally, it is possible to reverse the encoding.
